attributes.action: Ban Kerry Katona from appearing on any terrestrial television channel earlier than the 9pm watershed on grounds of taste and decency
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Kerry Katona should be hidden from the public on the grounds of taste and decency. Contrary to the PR machine at Iceland, she is very definitely NOT a role model for busy mums. Her continued presence on the television is a national disgrace!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
